name: Empeek
description:
Started from the garage, in the finest tradition of Silicon Valley, our enthusiastic ensemble grew up to a powerhouse of battle-tested technology geeks.
Nowadays, we share our expertise in healthcare IT, business automation tools, intelligent logistics systems, and marketplaces where buyers meet sellers.
 
We excel in transforming legacy systems, building medical IoT & EHR platforms, fleet management SaaS, and smart ERP systems. We also help companies to move their sensitive data to the cloud and manage it efficiently. 
Explore our portfolio — empeek.com/portfolio
Empeek is not only an outsourcing destination but an innovation-driven ecosystem. No go-betweens. Just analytics & engineering experts, collaborating with clients who want the best for their business. 
Drop us a line — hello@empeek.com
